Judul: USULAN STRATEGI KOMUNIKASI BAGI PESERTA BPJS KESEHATAN UNTUK MEMPEROLEH DUKUNGAN TERHADAP JKN-KIS PROGRAM
Abstrak:
BPJS Kesehatan (Health Social Security Organizing Agency) is a Public Legal Entity that is directly responsible to the President and has to organize National Health Insurance for all Indonesian people which was established in 2014 according to the Law Number 40 of 2004 concerning the National Social Security System. The purpose of the establishment of the BPJS Kesehatan is ensuring that participants receive health care and protection benefits in meeting basic health needs. 
Nowadays, the way to deliver messages to the public is very necessary for BPJS Kesehatan so that there is no misunderstanding in the field of the meaning of the message. This happened with the issuance of the Regulation of the Director of Health Service Guarantee number 2,3,5 in 2018, where there was a contra from the community and stakeholders regarding the regulation and until finally the regulation was revoked. BPJS Kesehatan must be able to anticipate this in the future so that it does not happen again. In this case, the BPJS Kesehatan must find a solution to solve the problem of how to deliver the information so that they can be accepted and receive support from the participants.
The analysis used on the problems faced using generic framework analysis consisting of PESTEL, VRIO, and SWOT and also using thematic analysis framework consisting of The Five A's Model which is used to analyze BPJS Kesehatan participants who have not used services, Customer Decision Journey is used to analyze BPJS Kesehatan participants who have used health services and use integrated marketing communication to analyze the appropriate channels in delivering content. It can be concluded through the results of the survey that the author has done that communication problems that occur due to lack of knowledge of participants related to BPJS Kesehatan and the channel in delivering this knowledge are not optimal. 
In order to increase support from BPJS Kesehatan participants, the appropriate communication strategy focusing in create content marketing about BPJS Kesehatan knowledge and channels marketing through three channels, first Maximization channels through channel that are preferred by participants and often seen or read by participants, second through optimization channels that have been developed by BPJS Kesehatan and the third through knowledge portal for frontline staff and Kader JKN. Business solutions at this operational level can be concluded with business solutions at the strategic level using the Diamond Strategy Framework. Since the strategy has aligned with a main focus of the organization, it could help BPJS Kesehatan in achieving their vision and mission that is realizing the best quality of health insurance for Indonesian society without discrimination.
